Name: Isle in the Sky
About the game: Fast paced archery game! You are trapped on a small island in the sky, delaying your inevitable death by rocks smashing into your head. This game is not for the weak! Be prepared for a thorough workout, where you have to duck, weave and move around a lot. You better have an extra headset cover, because the one you have will be sweaty! Key Features Satisfying bow & arrow physics! Waves of enemies with increasing difficulty. Several types of enemy types and behaviors, forcing you to adapt and be quick on your feet to complete the later levels Steam leaderboards, so you can compete with people from around the world All around great cardio workout!
